thm leopg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, cleo, c2), wa(wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, cleo, c2), wa(wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, cleo, c2), wa(wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  brabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cleo, wa(wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))), wa(wcel(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cho, co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  ralbidv(s0, chba, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq1d(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0), cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  fveq1d(co(cv(hs0), chod, cv(hs1)), cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs0), chod)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cho, co(c2, chod, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  ralbidv(s0, chba, wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1d(cfv(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0), cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  fveq1d(co(cv(hs0), chod, c0), cv(s0), co(c2, chod, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c2, chod, c0)
  df-leop(hs1, hs0, s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(co(c2, chod, c0), cho), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c2, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

thm leopg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[<_op]c2 ↔((c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[<_op]c2 ↔((c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))))), d(s0, c1))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(c0[<_op]c2 ↔((c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))))), d(s0, c3))
  brabg(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, cleo, ((c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))), ((hs0[-op]hs1)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]hs1)` s0)[.ih]s0))), ((hs0[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c0, (hs0[-op]hs1)∈ HrmOp, ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]hs1)` s0)[.ih]s0)), (hs0[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp, ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)))
  eleq1d((hs0[-op]hs1), cho, (hs0[-op]c0), hs1 = c0)
  ralbidv(s0, chba, hs1 = c0, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]hs1)` s0)[.ih]s0), 0[≤](((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (((hs0[-op]hs1)` s0)[.ih]s0), (((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), hs1 = c0)
  oveq1d(((hs0[-op]hs1)` s0), csp, s0, ((hs0[-op]c0)` s0), hs1 = c0)
  fveq1d((hs0[-op]hs1), s0, (hs0[-op]c0), hs1 = c0)
  oveq2(hs1, c0, hs0, chod)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, (hs0[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp, ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)), (c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp, ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)))
  eleq1d((hs0[-op]c0), cho, (c2[-op]c0), hs0 = c2)
  ralbidv(s0, chba, hs0 = c2, 0[≤](((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (((hs0[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), (((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), hs0 = c2)
  oveq1d(((hs0[-op]c0)` s0), csp, s0, ((c2[-op]c0)` s0), hs0 = c2)
  fveq1d((hs0[-op]c0), s0, (c2[-op]c0), hs0 = c2)
  oveq1(hs0, c2, chod, c0)
  df-leop(hs1, hs0, s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.w(((c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))))
  diff.hs0.w(((c2[-op]c0)∈ HrmOp ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c2[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wbr(c0, cleo, c1), wral(s0, chba, wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wral(s0, chba, wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))))
  leop(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbidva(s0, chba, wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))), wbr(co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))))

  breq2d(nat0, cle, co(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), cmin, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wcel(cv(s0), chba)))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(co(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), cmin, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)))
  anim12i(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho), wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba))
  hmopf(c0)
  hmopf(c1)
  eqtrd(co(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), cmin, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0))), co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), csp, cv(s0)), wa(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), chba)))
  oveq1d(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), wa(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), chba)))
  3expa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  3com12(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba), wcel(cv(s0), chba), wceq(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(s0)), co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  hodval(c1, c0, cv(s0))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wf(c0, chba, chba), wf(c1, chba, chba)), wcel(cv(s0), chba)), wceq(co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cmv, cfv(c0, cv(s0))), csp, cv(s0)), co(co(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)), cmin, co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), csp, cv(s0)))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), chba), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), chba), wcel(cv(s0), chba))

thm leop2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp)→(c0[<_op]c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[≤]((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), c0[<_op]c1, ∀(s0 ∈ ~H,((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[≤]((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)), ∀(s0 ∈ ~H, 0[≤](((c1[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)))
  leop(s0, c0, c1)
  ralbidva(s0, chba, (c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), 0[≤](((c1[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), ((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[≤]((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0))
  bitrd(((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp)∧ s0 ∈ ~H), 0[≤](((c1[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), ((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[≤]((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0), 0[≤](((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[-]((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (((c1[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), (((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[-]((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)), ((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp)∧ s0 ∈ ~H))
  sylan((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp), s0 ∈ ~H, (((c1[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0)=(((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[-]((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)), ((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧(c1 : ~H → ~H)))
  anim12i(c0 ∈ HrmOp, c1 ∈ HrmOp, (c0 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → ~H))
  hmopf(c0)
  hmopf(c1)
  eqtrd((((c1[-op]c0)` s0)[.ih]s0), (((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[-]((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)), (((c1 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s0))[.ih]s0), (((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧ s0 ∈ ~H))
  oveq1d(((c1[-op]c0)` s0), csp, s0, ((c1 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s0)), (((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧ s0 ∈ ~H))
  3expa((c0 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → ~H), s0 ∈ ~H, ((c1[-op]c0)` s0)=((c1 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s0)))
  3com12((c0 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → ~H), s0 ∈ ~H, ((c1[-op]c0)` s0)=((c1 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s0)))
  hodval(c1, c0, s0)
  syl3anc((((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧(c1 : ~H → ~H))∧ s0 ∈ ~H), (((c1 ` s0)[-h](c0 ` s0))[.ih]s0)=(((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)[-]((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)), (c1 ` s0)∈ ~H, (c0 ` s0)∈ ~H, s0 ∈ ~H)
  adantll((c0 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → ~H), s0 ∈ ~H, (c1 ` s0)∈ ~H)
  ffvelrn(c1, chba, chba, s0)
  adantlr((c0 : ~H → ~H), (c1 : ~H → ~H), s0 ∈ ~H, (c0 ` s0)∈ ~H)
  ffvelrn(c0, chba, chba, s0)
  simpr(((c0 : ~H → ~H)∧(c1 : ~H → ~H)), s0 ∈ ~H)
  his2sub((c1 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), s0)
  subge0d(((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0), ((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0), ((c0 ∈ HrmOp ∧ c1 ∈ HrmOp)∧ s0 ∈ ~H))
  adantll(c0 ∈ HrmOp, c1 ∈ HrmOp, s0 ∈ ~H, ((c1 ` s0)[.ih]s0)∈ ℝ)
  hmopre(c1, s0)
  adantlr(c0 ∈ HrmOp, c1 ∈ HrmOp, s0 ∈ ~H, ((c0 ` s0)[.ih]s0)∈ ℝ)
  hmopre(c0, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ HrmOp, c1 ∈ HrmOp)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cho)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cho)
  diff.cho.s(s0)

thm leop3(class c0, class c1) {

  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, cho), wcel(c1, cho)), wb(wbr(ch0o, cleo, co(c1, chod, c0)), wral(hs0, chba, wbr(co(cfv(ch0o, cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs0)), cle, co(cfv(co(c1, chod, c0), cv(hs0)), csp, cv(hs0))))), wcel(ch0o, cho), wcel(co(c1, chod, c0), cho))

blocks.content: The zero operator is a positive operator. (The literature calls it "positive", even though in some sense it is really "nonnegative".) Part of Example 12.2(i) in [Young] p. 142. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
